text: “nætahot itāmat viśāla yayi oba manasehi sitena venat ōnǣma vastuvak bavaṭa pat vanu”. (mesē venas vū) pasu “apava kavurun nam paṇa ganvannēda?”yi ovungē vimasumaṭa, (esē vimasuvahot nabiyē! oba ovunṭa) “obava paḷamuven kavurun utpādanaya kaḷēda, ohuma (oba maraṇayaṭa pat vū pasuda obava nægiṭṭavanu æta)” yayi pavasanu. eyaṭa ovun tamangē hisa oba pættaṭa æla kara, “edina kavadā (ennēda)?”yi vimasannāha. (eyaṭa) oba (ovunṭa “eya) itāmat ikmaninda pæmiṇiya hækiya” yayi pavasanu mænava
